title: What are these Fonts please & I'll donate $100 to the site
content:
I've been trying to work out the style of fonts for the last 2 days  
if somene could please identify the 2 styles and im happy to  
donate $100 to typophile.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [-Whats Fonts.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108064557/http:/typophile.com/files/-Whats%20Fonts.pdf) | 51.59 KB |
author: spiralink

comments.content:
Cheers Akira.

Mods i need typophile paypal address?
Has a donation been made? If so, how and to whom?
I would like to donate also, did we ever determine the correct PayPal address?
If you want to donate money, please post contact [Jared Benson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108064557/http:/typophile.com/user/3).
